review.title: “Nice place to start”
review.pros: Pros – The company accept you way before junior level. It's is a good start for some great future internships. Working environment is really joyful and family oriented. Boss is a great person!
review.cons: Cons – Small company. Don't have much of full time offerings chance. It was more like a work rather than an internship to me.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I think I would growth faster. I would use more aggressive marketing approaches. The bigger the company is, the more efficient it is.
